website_summaries.verdict: This durable shower speaker is easy to use and can withstand any amount of water without breaking or losing sound quality.
pros: Large buttons are easy to see
Waterproof design protects the speaker even if fully submerged
Suction cup adheres to shower wall
cons: Some users wish the volume would go slightly higher

customer_reviews.title: Love this speaker
customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker. Have no complaints. Works well. My shower has the kind of wall that this kind of suction cup won't hold. We came up with a clever option that works great. Cut a u shape in the front a small hard plastic container. Attach to the wall. Slide it down. See pictures. The auction cup works fine on appropriate surfaces. We just didn't have any appropriate surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth L.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound, actually works in the shower.
customer_reviews.text: This speaker actually stays suctioned to the shower and really is water proof! It has better sound than I anticipated from a shower speaker. I like that the bluetooth connects so easily and quickly. The bass is decent for a small device. If i could change anything, it would be that the volume buttons were separate from the skip buttons, sometimes I try to adjust the volume and it skips the song.
customer_reviews.author: amber hanni

customer_reviews.title: Everything I had hoped for
customer_reviews.text: Rather than install a speaker in the ceiling of our master bathroom during our beyond-the-studs remodel, we tried out the bluetooth shower speaker. It's perfect in every way. Suctions to the glass wall of the shower, plenty loud for the shower--volume determined by the phone--but can be controlled with the speaker buttons, easy to recharge using standard USB outlet. Best of all, it's portable, unlike a ceiling speaker, so I can travel with the speaker or use it outdoors to boost my phone's speaker. Don't expect to use it for dance music, but great when a phone speaker isn't enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: May be my most disappointing purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace an mpow buckler, and man, did I go wrong. 1. This uses a headphone jack-sized charger instead of more standard micro-USB. Lose it and you're screwed. 2. Sound quality is horrible. Very tinny and nigh unto unlistenable. 3. Battery life is awful. I charged my old mpow speaker every six months or so. This one, I charged, used once, and the next time I wanted to use it again, it was dead. I'm too practical a guy to just throw something away, but when it was dead so soon after a charge, I was able to overcome my cheapness and finally, joyfully, trashed this pile of crap.
customer_reviews.author: Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Love the speaker, low battery tone is annoying though
customer_reviews.text: Suction cup holds well, sound is really good. Blue tooth on my Alcatel One Touch connects easily every time. Battery life is okay. Only complaint... when it gets low battery, it interrupts your music to give a beep tone every minute or so. It's very annoying. Not even worth playing music while it's doing a low battery tone, because the music is constantly interrupted. It would have been nice if they used a light color change for low battery warning, or made the tone not as frequent.
customer_reviews.author: Elise B

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this powerful little speaker. At first the controls were hard to figure out but then I read the directions, who knew that's what they were for. 😋 I use the speaker even outside of the shower just to listen to music while cleaning! Its loud enough for it's job and as long as you have up your Volume on your phone and the volume up on the speaker it actually has some good little Bass to it. Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.author: Brittani

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker is great. I love that I'm able to skip songs while I'm in the shower. It has pretty good sound quality for such a small speaker. The suction cup holds tight. It's easy to recharge. I wish it came in other colors, but that obviously doesn't have an effect on the quality, which is why I still gave it 5 stars. My husband thought this was a ridiculous purchase, but he used it last night and changed his mind.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: No cons that I can see so far. Well worth the price. Loud too. Doesn't drown out my wife's singing but I can't reasonably knock a star off for that one.
customer_reviews.author: Das

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave this item a 1 star review because it simply would not connect to my Echo Dot. My review prompted an immediate email from Margo, who pledged to get the speaker working for me. She sent recommendations for getting it to connect, none of which worked. She then sent me a replacement unit, and I had trouble with that one as well. However, thanks to additional instructions from Margo, and a little fiddling around in the Alexa app on my phone, we got it working. I'm very happy with the speaker. We're not talking Harmon Kardon here, but my wife loves the sound it produces in the shower, and if my wife is happy, then I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: Wes Eades (psychotherapist and pastoral counselor)

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and inexpensive.
customer_reviews.text: i am updating my initial review. Initial we had issues with connectivity. Seems to have gone away. Great sound and a long battery life. Primarily used in the shower. Phone about 4ft away. Haven’t tried for distance yet. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: ckleiss

customer_reviews.title: better than expected
customer_reviews.text: i was in for a bluetooth speaker that i could use in the shower. this does delivers. it's not too pricey and the controls aren't hard to push. the mic for calls is actually really good, i didnt' have to repeat myself when taking calls while showering. the suction stays so far, but time will tell. holds about a good mount of a charge, maybe even longer than 6 hours. i guess it all depends on how high the volume is. and as far as sound it actually exceeded my expectations. surprisingly has a good bass. also if you have an EQ on your phone, you can tweak it.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: SUPER FAST SHIPPING
customer_reviews.text: SUPER FAST SHIPPING, BEST SHOWER SPEAKER ON THE MARKET, FABULOUS SOUND, BEST CUSTOMER SERVICE EVER, MARGO WAS FANTASTIC! NO NEED TO LOOK FURTHER, iFOX IS THE ONLY WAY TO START YOUR DAY WITH A SMILE! A++++
customer_reviews.author: hawk1166

customer_reviews.title: Works well but 3 stars because I wish it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well but 3 stars because I wish it was louder and it does get choppy if anything passes between the phone and speaker even when they are 4 feet away from each Other. Update. The company contacted me and sent me a replacement. The connection is much more stable and does not cut out when someone walks between the speaker and phone. The volume is about the same but I might be expecting to much from the small speaker. Very good for the shower, adequate for using on the bass boat while fishing. Thank you to the company for making it right.
customer_reviews.author: William D.

customer_reviews.title: Get this shower speaker, it's a gem!
customer_reviews.text: This item is really great and it works extremely well. Even bought one for my son. I had a little difficulty powering off the device, but customer help pointed out that I have to hold the power button down for 5-6 seconds. (It's in the manual, but I had mixed that up with how to pair devices). This truly is a wonderful product, very versatile, and it gets used every day. If you're addicted to podcasts, live sports audio, music, audio books, anything that streams/plays on an iPhone, get this shower speaker. You will be delighted with it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Larson

customer_reviews.title: Great little Speaker! Fantastic Stocking Stuffer!
customer_reviews.text: So Far, this has turned out to be an amazing purchase. If it continues to perform as well as it has, during the next few weeks, this is going to be my favorite stocking stuffer this year! Update 12/1/17: Still works great. Makes showering more fun.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.PMD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality, and adequate volume for use in the shower. Takes quite a long time to charge, but it stays charged for about a week of consistent use everyday. The only downside is that the suction cup does not work in my shower at all, and has fallen off several times. Eventually, I decided to just suction cup it to the lip of the tub, which seems to work better. Overall, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DelaneyTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: First one didn't work but company reached out and sent a replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Update---The company reached out and sent a new speaker. This speaker appears to work very well. I was able to connect my phone to it easily and the sound quality is good. Kudos to the company for reaching out and sending a replacement. This speaker was very disappointing, it did not connect properly to devices. The audio was going in and out the entire time. I returned this product and bought the AquaAudio Cubo which works wonderfully. I would not recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a birthday gift for my husband and he loves it! I am always a little apprehensive about buying gifts that I haven't already tested out myself --but I figured that I couldn't go wrong with all the great reviews, and I was not disappointed! I appreciate how portable it is and the sound quality is remarkable --especially for a speaker of its size. He doesn't use the speaker much, just a half hour in the morning and/or evening, and sometimes not everyday, but the battery life literally lasts a week or more. Would definitely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the Amazon Prime discounted price.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't entirely sure just how good this speaker was going to be because I wanted good sound quality, loudness, and decent bass. I felt like that was a bit much to ask for one product to have that was under $80 retail (bought for $30.) Pros: Great sound, very loud (especially in an enclosed bathroom,) surprisingly good bass. Very easy to use all features. Simply charge out of the box and you'll be good for weeks. Cons: it comes with a charging cable but does not come with the piece that you actually plug into the wall. That wasn't a big enough set back for me since I already had 4 outlet adapters so this isn't effecting my rating.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Strahl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shower Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a company follow up twice to check in on the speaker. Once to give instructions and tips on usage and again a few weeks later to see how it was working. I love the smaller size, Bluetooth connection, power of sound for the shower is great, you can skip and reverse tracks by the press of a button on the speaker (which was a must have for me), and the price for quality was great.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Baumann III

customer_reviews.title: —— EDIT —— The seller reached out and turns out ...
customer_reviews.text: —— EDIT —— The seller reached out and turns out the next song button is also the volume up button. I also finally got it to stick to a different surface in the shower. —— EDIT —— Not very loud, which is disappointing. I was looking forward to some serious sound, but no such luck. Also, it does not stick to shower glass and only sticks to on two walls of the shower - which severely limited where I could place the speaker, without it falling.
customer_reviews.author: Aleah

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely waterproof Bluetooth speaker with incredible sound quality. Can’t be beat for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly love this amazing little speaker! Everything about it exceeds my expectations for such an affordable item. Even the suction cup works incredibly well. My son loves carrying it around (he’s 2) unlike other Bluetooth speakers, it’s really light. Which is great considering most of the time it’s being used I have soapy hands and dropping a heavy speaker on my feet would ruin my shower. The lightweight design does not, in any way, mean this speaker sacrifices quality or performance. It truly is the perfect shower speaker. I can’t believe how affordable it is. I’m incredibly happy with both the speaker and customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for girlfriend She can be a complainer , can break damn near anything too Haven’t heard anything about it from her so ... yeah
customer_reviews.author: Pete S.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and performs as expected
customer_reviews.text: I've had the iF012 speaker for a few weeks now, and I'm happy to report that it's working great. Battery lasts a long time in between charges and the sound quality is the best you can hope for out of a waterproof speaker in your shower. If I had to come up with an complaint, it would be the lack of a standard charger interface. The iFox speaker uses a headphone-style jack for charging and I have to keep track of the cable. It would be much easier if it just had a standard MicroUSB charging port I could plug into any old smartphone charger.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Amazon reviews don't lie. Best BT shower speaker available for $30
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised in the sound, not great, but excellent for the relative size and price point of product. Lightweight too. Although you can find shower speakers at less than 50% than the cost of the iFox. For $30 your getting a high quality, well built, good sounding speaker with very good battery life. I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Gregory L.

customer_reviews.title: 99 that sounds just as good, so far one advantage this one has is ...
customer_reviews.text: speaker is ok, bought one on ebay for 11.99 that sounds just as good, so far one advantage this one has is the battery seems to go longer, not sure this speaker is worth more than double other one though, REVISED REVIEW, this speaker stopped working after 3 months, will no longer connect with blue tooth, went back to the 11.99 Speaker that still works
customer_reviews.author: Jean James

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: It is a great bluetooth speaker for the shower. The sound quality is great also. I play Pandora on it mostly, but if you have music on your phone it will play that as well. I wish it had AM/FM radio also, but with Pandora you can play anything off any device...cellphone, tablet, etc. I have yet to try to call feature, but might one day. I really don't need to talk someone that bad that it can't wait until after I am out of the shower, but for busy executive type people it is a neat feature.
customer_reviews.author: Boatnone

customer_reviews.title: works as described
customer_reviews.text: Update: I very much like this product. iFox was very responsive to my comments below and promptly sent me a new item. The new speaker works very well and I have not had any more issues, I guess my original issue was just a glitchy product, but my new item is great. Works ok for music, for some reason with audio books it cuts off the first letter in a sentence... maybe it’s some kind of noise cancellation feature but for music no issues.
customer_reviews.author: studentdoc

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well. Suction doesn't work well on our walls but the surface is not designed to accommodate suction cups. Volume works well and does what it advertised. No complaints here. For those who said volume is a problem, I found that you can also adjust with the volume of your pairing device. I have the volume on the speaker up full but found that if I also adjust my Ipad that I can get even more volume.
customer_reviews.author: jack c.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this thing! Was just using my phone speaker to listen to my comedy while taking a bath. Already drowned this thing and it still works. Plenlty loud enough, most of the time I have to turn it down. Suction cup is sturdy, sticks to the wall and doesn't fall off. Couldn't be happier. It's worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Big Crab

customer_reviews.title: will not hold a charge.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this device and it would not work as expected. I went to the Maufacturer website and used the contact link to let them know. They sent a new device which I received 2 days later. I set it up and it worked well for a few minutes however it will not hold a charge. hoping to hear back from them . They gave me a choice for full refund or a second replacement, took the replacement and it works as expected. Customer service is second to none.
customer_reviews.author: Nunyabidness

customer_reviews.title: Vendor Stand by Their Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought it March 2017, just died today, July 2018. This is my second Bluetooth shower speaker, I guess they just don’t last. Worked fine while it lasted. Update: I was contacted by their customer service and they are going to send me out a new one today! This product did not come with a warrenty and they are still willing to back up their products. Amazing! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K. Swenson

customer_reviews.title: volume is plenty loud enough to hear over running water doing dishes so I expect it will be great in the shower also
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried it in the shower yet but it also sticks to the surface of my kitchen cabinets for use while doing dishes, volume is plenty loud enough to hear over running water doing dishes so I expect it will be great in the shower also. Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: InsomnoMom

customer_reviews.title: Quite pleasing, would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about the suction cup, it's great. My last bluetooth speaker at a similar price point was terrible, this one is quite good. The pro-active customer service would seem overbearing if every email didn't have at least one really useful tidbit in it. Although the volume doesn't go up like I'd like it to the fact that I can stick it right next to my ear makes up for it (and honestly my family is pleased that I'm not blasting NPR throughout the house). I've come to this speaker as a hostile audience but walk away quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: David Schachter

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker for the price but could be louder.
customer_reviews.text: After a few weeks, this speaker has far exceeded my expectations. The sound quality is pretty good. And it really is waterproof and holds to the shower wall quite well. If I had any complaint at all, it would be that the charging cable not being a micro-usb connection means I have to keep track of the included cable. Also the quality of sound is pretty good, but I wish the volume could be a bit louder. I have a loud shower and it may be fine, but even at full volume I can barely hear most of the music I play.
customer_reviews.author: Adam G.

customer_reviews.title: Does not last.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this speaker for nearly a year now and it has totally scrapped out. Volume barely goes to an audible level. I also had a lot of trouble keeping it connected to any device. I would not suggest this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lourie

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far!
customer_reviews.text: Lightning fast delivery and an advance email with operational tips. So far, so good. Plenty of volume. The above was my comment shortly after getting the iFox speaker. I've now been using it for months and it still works great. The rechargeable battery life is amazing...I'll go weeks between recharging. This is now my second iFox speaker purchase. I bought this one for my son. Great volume and LONG lasting rechargeable battery. The best shower speaker I've found by far.
customer_reviews.author: QuoteNotes

customer_reviews.title: Love this speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I can hear my music while I shower and even answer my phone. It's an amazing product! My kids will be so excited to listen to their own music while they bathe/shower! The suction cup on the back is large and has kept the speaker on so far.
customer_reviews.author: Always a Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love this Lil' Guy!
customer_reviews.text: The first speaker I received stopped working shortly after I took it out of the box but iFox was courteous and professional and quickly sent me a replacement! I am glad they did because I love this little guy. It has changed the way I shower..in fact..I look forward to getting cleaned up more than ever! Try listening to a podcast while shampooing your hair...I promise..it will turn you into a new man/woman. It has held a charge for a few weeks worth of showers at this point (as is still going). The sound is awesome for its size, as well. Would purchase again..I think this makes a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica d.

customer_reviews.title: Worked, then didn't work, replacement sent, amazing custimer service!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Device stopped working after a month. Ifox contacted me immediately and sent a replacement. Their customer service is excellent. I did lots of research on portable speakers before buying this one. I knew that this was supposed to be a quality product. Even the best products can have a defect once in a while. I'm changing my original 1 star, to a 5 star for now. The speaker worked great for a little over a month. The sound was great. I could hear it on the other side of the house when my son took his showers with it. And the 5 stars is also for the superb customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Philippe D

customer_reviews.title: Don't Think Cheaper Is Better. I Learned The Hard Way
customer_reviews.text: The speaker works flawlessly. It's plenty loud enough if you turn your volume up all the way on whatever device your using. The setup was effortless. I've only used the speaker twice and both times it was in the shower and had no problems with the suction cup or the controls. I received a separate email from the manufacture making sure I was happy with their product, and assured me if there were any problems with the operation or functioning of their product, they would assist me or replace/refund their product. So far so good. I purchased a cheaper, similar product, and it was returned and replaced with this after having nothing but problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: fugley4651

customer_reviews.title: Better than made in China
customer_reviews.text: So far, I've accidentally dropped my new speaker on my tile flooring, and it still works perfectly. I needed a new shower speaker to replace the unfortunate pile of garbage I purchased on the cheap for myself over Christmas - the cheap one couldn't hold a signal, but my new iFox speaker is wonderful. Pairs straight to my computer and I can stream Spotify while I shower. The sound is clear, it can hold a Bluetooth signal, and you don't have to worry about getting it wet.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Very cool shower speakers!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! Great sound and functionality for the price. The bluetooth connection was simple and it was up and running in a couple of minutes. You cannot change volume from the speaker (that has to be done by phone) but you can skip songs as needed. I've tried making phone calls using the double click phone function (which calls the last number you called on your phone) but it didn't seem to work. I'll have to re-read the instructions. I haven't tried to answer a call in the shower yet (bad timing I guess).
customer_reviews.author: Brian Flatt

customer_reviews.title: Loving the sound and the battery life!
customer_reviews.text: The audio quality and battery life are much, much better than the little SoundBot that I had years ago. I love that this thing will hold a charge even if I go for a couple of weeks without using it. I rarely need to plug it in, which is fabulous. I haven't mastered the suction cup, but it looks like there are some suggestions in the reviews and Q&A, so I'll take a look at those and see what I'm doing wrong. Right now I just set it on the ledge of the tub and that works fine for me. Thanks for reading! If my review was helpful, I'd really appreciate you marking it as such :)
customer_reviews.author: Margery Meanwell

customer_reviews.title: Great volume and sound for a small speaker!  What a fun way to sing along in the shower!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this shower speaker! Set up and sync in a New York minute!! No more having to have her ipad in the humid bathroom. Excellent volume even with a full blast shower running. Still sticking well to the very smooth shower stall wall. Suction cup is as large as the speaker! Many options for volume, song selections, and get this.....you can answer your phone!! I told her NEVER to do that in the shower!! Ha! Makes an excellent, affordable gift for a teen who loves their music!! Will purchase more for gifts and am sure to be voted, "best auntie of the year"!!! Now, to curb the 45 minute showers!!
customer_reviews.author: frenchpress

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great for my shower. I like to listen to music/news while in the bathroom and this being water resistant gives me peace of mind. Only gripe i have is the slightly piercing highs and the annoying low battery indicator. It would be much better if the low battery tone wasn't as frequent. It gets irritating and doesnt make sense for it to play music for +10 mins longer. Make it start start with less time or increase the intervals. Otherwise, great speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew N.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: The suction cup does not work. It barely can stay in place for a minute. If you are planning to buy it and use the suction cup to the wall, then forget it. You are going to have problem. Besides, when the shower is tuning the stalk between speaker and suction cup lose its consistency and little by little it face down. Quality is ok but it would have been nicer if the speakers were in front not in the back. Overall I give it three stars. And if I knew these issues I definitely would have not bought it. The number of good reviews fooled me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound in a weather resistant package.
customer_reviews.text: The iFox speaker has a great sound in a very useful package. I don't use it much in the shower for which it is marketed as that is a fairly noisy chamber. For bathing, or relaxing on the patio this little speaker is perfect. Battery life has been excellent. Wish there were a switch to keep phone notifications from interrupting the music.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: So good my teen stole it from me
customer_reviews.text: The pairing technology is very idiot friendly, which I appreciate. The sound quality is good. I use it in my steam shower so it definitely waterproof. The suction cup is appropriately sized and it affixed securely to the glass shower wall. For the amount of time I spend in the shower, I haven't had to recharge it too quickly. The sound doesn't distort at higher volumes. Pretty lightweight and I can use it in situations where water isn't an issue. And my teen stole it. That should indicate how good it is. I'm going to buy myself another to replace the one that was hijacked.
customer_reviews.author: Blkdahl

customer_reviews.title: Fails in two months! Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a birthday gift for my husband. It worked great at first. He's only had it TWO months. He charges it only when it needs it, keeps it out of waters reach, wipes it after every shower just in case there was a droplet on it. Now it's speakers have stopped working, the Bluetooth won't register his phone but every ten tries and the battery isn't lasting. I would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best one yet!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Now I can listen to podcasts in the shower! I bought another brand and it didn’t stick to the wall, wasn’t loud enough, and it yelled at you every time the Bluetooth connected or disconnected. This one has been stuck to the wall for months- no sliding down the shower wall. It’s loud enough to hear- even when my clogged drain makes it sound like I’m drawing a bath. And the best part- it doesn’t yell at me!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Rose

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend the iFox speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with my speaker volume, and the owners reached out immediately to remedy the situation. I can't say enough good things about how they handled it. I absolutely love my little speaker. Perfect for jamming out in the shower. Definitely a step up from my AM/FM shower radio I had in the 90's! LOL Pairs easily to any device and I can even answer the phone if I wanted to. Love how I can skip or replay a song with ease on the speaker too.
customer_reviews.author: Little Crow

customer_reviews.title: iFox is an amazing company!
customer_reviews.text: I got my speaker on sale about a month ago. When I first received it, I was so excited! The speaker's incredibly loud considering it's size and waterproof ability. Unfortunately the suction cup malfunctioned and mines dropped about 4-5 feet. Definitely would recommend to be extra careful when re-suctioning the device to a flat, dry, clean surface. I reached out to both Amazon and the company and they sent me a new speaker. I can't believe how amazing their customer service and device is: shoutout to you Margo! You guys are incredible!
customer_reviews.author: laila

customer_reviews.title: Nice and loud, great sound quality, reliable suction
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker. We could never hear the sound from a podcast in the shower but this has overcome the problem by far. Nice sound quality, reliably waterproof. I love that it is not just a speaker - you can manipulate the file being played (FF, rewind, etc) and it has both a hanging as well as a suction option. We have used it outdoors, indoors and in watery environments. Only complaint is that one person has to disconnect from the device before another person can connect which takes a little bit of planning.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Jones

customer_reviews.title: So good my daughter took it
customer_reviews.text: I had this for one day before my daughter came and took it from me. I did find it super easy to connect to and the sound is awesome. I found it loud enough for me in the shower but not to loud with my daughter who doesnt always know volume control. I did have a slight problem making it stick to my shower which is an uneven stone so it works better with smooth surfaces like my daughters bathroom that has tile. But I have a shelf I can easily put it on so it wasnt an issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nzingha

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: This lil speaker is pretty awesome! Got it for my daughter, who was very pleased with it. The sound is amazing, and that is a big plus with me when I buy anything that plays music. After about a month we had a little problem with it. Contacted the company (who had already messaged me right after delivery to make sure I was happy with my purchase), and without hesitation a new one was shipped out! Not only is the product worth your money, but the customer service alone is better than most hands down! Go on and make the purchase! You won't regret it!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I've had it in my shower for a few weeks now, and the battery still hasn't needed recharging! It has also stayed suctioned to the wall of my shower without any problems. The sound quality is fine for listening to podcasts/music (although it is not perfect). It gets plenty loud, but you have to adjust the volume on the bluetooth device you are streaming from first (if your phone's volume is really low, the speaker maxes out at that volume). Overall, it has been a solid device.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, not great design
customer_reviews.text: The speaker itself works well. It has a pretty clear sound for its size, and loud enough to hear over the shower noise. However, the Bluetooth connection/pairing isn't great. The device doesn't make it easy to easily switch in and out connections between different phones, which is problem, since naturally, multiple different people will use the bathroom throughout the day and want to connect their phones. Additionally, the charging port is some barrel-jack connector, not a standard mini/micro USB, like everything else is these days. I lost the cable, and had to go hunt for a new one that was the right size and rating, instead of just being able to use a standard USB-type cable that are ubiquitous.
customer_reviews.author: Jake W.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my battery operated shower radio. The first time I used it the suction cup gave way a few hours later and broke the handle. After writing a review I was contacted by the company and sent a replacement. Customer service was awesome, I love my shower radio and just to be safe I use a zip tie through the handle and hang it on the shower rod behind the curtains just to make sure the suction cup does not let loose, which we all know they will eventually. For my purposes, it was money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Diana L Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Dead in 9 months
customer_reviews.text: The speaker is dead, only lasted 9 months. I will try to get another one under 1 year "guarantee" Update: Was provided a replacement speaker. The response was very quick. Let's see how long this one lasts. I am a little leery since there are over 70 reviews that state the speaker no longer works. I guess for the price, if you get 2 years out of 2 units, it's worth it. Be aware, if you do get a replacement, you'll get several e-mails asking for removal of the negative review. The truth is best.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: [Edited] Broke within a week
customer_reviews.text: [edit] The seller has reached out to send me a new one. They feel that my original was faulty to begin with. The speaker is a good speaker so we shall see how the new one is. I am thankful for the good customer service so far regarding this issue! This broke literally a week after I got it. I used the carabeener clip to hang it on a hook by my shower (after it fell off the shower wall) and next thing I know the part connecting to the speaker SNAPPED. So now it’s broken. Cool. Don’t buy if you want it to last 🙄
customer_reviews.author: Haley Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I like that this product is fully water resistant, and that the sound quality is great. The suction cup does not work on tile showers/bathtubs. This is not an issue for me, as I have a shower rack that serves as a shelf. The product is very durable- I have dropped it multiple times and there's not a mark on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia.

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker shower
customer_reviews.text: What I like most about this is now being able to listen to music or books in the shower! What I don't like is that my phone doesn't automatically connect, after my husband has used his phone to connect. So there I am screaming in the house to have him "disconnect". Would be great if I could override this and just get in the shower! Despite that... I do love it! The sound quality is great when I'm in the shower and/or bathroom getting ready. Battery life excellence!
customer_reviews.author: T. S

customer_reviews.title: Sounds goods and my kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: It’s wonderful! My kids love music and now their tunes are not drowned out the rest of the house while they shower. With the speaker in the show they can turn down the sound. The only thing I worry about is the speaker does not seam to Hold Street straight on the suction cup I Kinda flops a little downward. I’m not sure how to hold up over time, I hope the suction cup does not brake off the speaker. Other than that the sound is great and clear. Worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Very durable Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: Pros : Good sound quality Very water resistant Very du Excellent Bluetooth connectivity Cons: None My favorite thing about this little shower speaker is that it sounds great and just keeps on going. My speaker has fallen to the shower floor from at least 5 feet up several times due to me no firmly attaching it to the wall. In spite of this, other than a broken plastic hanging loop at the top of the speaker, it continues to work perfectly. And, this speaker has pretty descent sound for a small Bluetooth speaker! I'd buy another in a heartbeat if something ever happened to this one. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: LeComptes

customer_reviews.title: Completely Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality was pretty average for the price and size. It was waterproof. It completely stopped working after a month and a half. It stopped holding a charge great enough to create sound. The indicator light would glow but no sound. Water never got in the charging connector so i don't know what happened to it. Unfortunately It stopped working after the return policy period so....
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Simple, elegant shower speaker.
customer_reviews.text: The iFox came charged and ready to go right out of the box. Paired right up and stuck right where I put it with no difficulty whatsoever. Don't expect Bose surround sound and you won't be disappointed. Love streaming Morning Edition now while getting ready. Oh, and it looks pretty cool!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Coulson

customer_reviews.title: Quality shower speaker
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a pretty good shower speaker. The sound quality is actually quite good for the price. The suction cup has held up well and it's never fallen off the wall. Maintains a charge for quite a long time. Actually answered a phone call in the shower the other day and I had no issues hearing my wife on the other end. She said she had no problems hearing me over the running water either, which actually pleasantly surprised me. I'd definitely recommend if you're wanting a decent shower speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I had a shower radio before that you could barely hear over the water. Not with this one! The sound is great for the price and I'm very pleased. Only taking off one star because it doesn't always connect automatically to my phone, but not a bug issue. I also find it frustrating that the volume and back/next buttons are the same button. I tend to end up changing the song when I meant to adjust the volume. But overall, I definitely recommend. Good value and works well.
customer_reviews.author: LaneOnline

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in January 2020 and had an issue with the charging capability and the iFox team fixed my issue right away. I was so impressed with this customer service and standing by their product. I will definitely be buying from this team again. The actual speaker connects to Bluetooth perfectly on my phone, is easy to use. The sound quality isn't like your headphones or a standard speaker, but I assumed this because if it is in the shower, it can't be perfect. But I really have no issues and really have enjoyed my purchase. For the price and customer service, it can't be beat!
customer_reviews.author: ALM188

customer_reviews.title: Finally a way to listen to news and music while in the shower!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my portable speaker and phone don't transmit sound well enough while I'm in the shower. The sound quality is great, given that it's a small shower speaker. Battery life is great; I've charged it once since I started using it a month ago (my showers are only 10-15 minutes long, for perspective). No issues with connectivity thus far. It definitely has enough volume... I have to turn it down because it is too loud sometimes! I can also talk on the phone if I get a call, although the sound of the water makes it hard for people to hear me. It sticks well to my shower door and has not fallen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job
customer_reviews.text: The product does exactly what it is supposed to do. It is well made, no the sound quality is not stellar, but more than adequate. My only complaint is that the suction cup does not hold indefinitely. (They never do.) I mount it on the shower wall, and it holds for 5-8 days before it comes crashing down, normally in the middle of the night...lol. Suction cups just do not maintain their hold longterm.
customer_reviews.author: D. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Great idea! Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this little speaker! Sound quality is a lot better than my phone. Battery lasts for a long time and it alerts you when the battery is getting low, it starts to chirp. I love that you can skip songs or repeat songs and there is also I volume button. My husband and son laughed at me for buying this, but they are enjoying it now also. Works great with Amazon music! Great gift for anyone that enjoys their shower or for the ones that love to sing in the shower!
customer_reviews.author: Fanny

customer_reviews.title: Great shower speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my husband who tends to bring his phone in the shower and listen to the radio. This works great! I use it all the time now too. I find it works best to leave the speaker off until you get into the shower. I just pick what I want to listen to on my phone and start playing it, then when I get into the shower I press the power button and it connects so quickly! You can adjust the volume from the shower directly on the speaker. It looks like you could even accept an incoming phone call from the speaker as well (personally I haven’t tried that!) 😂
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Price with Poor Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is a convenient way to listen to your music in a shower or in any other wet/humid environment giving a long battery life and easy to connect. However the sound quality is not that good in my opinion. It sounds like the mid-range and treble are turned up so high that it is screechy and hurts my ears. Bass is virtually non-existent and to me that would have gone a long way to improve the sound quality. I can say I only recommend this if sound quality is not a priority for you and are just looking for something cheap. Otherwise I’d avoid this if sound quality is important to you.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: New design is great
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED review: I previously didn't have great things to say about the physical design of this product. In somewhat of a rarity, I actually was contacted by the company - directly - to help resolve my problem. They sent me a new version of their speaker that resolved the issues I was complaining about on Amazon. All in all, I felt this was a huge gesture on their part to make things right, and I really like the new version of the speaker! Bravo to iFox!
customer_reviews.author: S2415

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what I wanted it to.
customer_reviews.text: It charges quickly enough, is loud enough for use in the shower, and has survived direct water hits. Is it a top of the line sound quality? Of course not but I am giving it 5 out of 5 in its context for its purpose... a speaker for having tunes in the shower. UPDATE: My wife loves this as part of her wakeup routine and has been using it for over a month now. I would say we recharge it every couple or three weeks and no issues or failure of waterproofing.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Palindrome

customer_reviews.title: Charging is impossible for me.
customer_reviews.text: I had no problem with sound, worked as advertised. For what I wanted, outside by pool, worked great. However, charging for me doesn’t work after the first or second time. I’ve changed USBs, I’ve changed cords, but it just won’t charge again. It will work plugged into a port but shows red light (as you turn on) but simply won’t charge. Since this is my second one and 7,000 people like it, it must be me. I haven’t had problems charging any of the multiple items we charge today, but I give up on this. I won’t bother to try to replace again, I’ll just put it down as a Bad choice on my part.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Sound great!
customer_reviews.text: Got this speaker so I could listen to podcasts in the shower. It works and sounds great. Very happy with my purchase. Only disappointment is that the suction cup will not adhere to raised surface of my shower tiles so I have resorted to placing it on the edge of the bathtub. Would be nice if it had loop of some kind so it could be hung from shower nozzle.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Manning

customer_reviews.title: This speaker is awesome sounding
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised by how much bass this speaker has, for the price I paid. It doesn’t have that muffled sound, sound is nice and crisp. It lasted longer than a week before I had to charge it. Not sure why some people said they had problems with the suction, put it in your upper corner of the bathroom away from the shower head. I did that and it stayed, I even removed it to charge and was able to re-suction with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a good shower speaker and great for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a good shower speaker and great for the money. But, what stands out is the exceptional customer service. 3 months past warranty, I had problems with the speaker. On a whim, I contacted iFox expecting to be told, "well it's out of warranty." Instead I got an immediate email back offering to send me a replacement. You can't ask for more than that. I was just wowed by the warm, personal response. I recommend the speaker, but can't say enough good things about the company that sells it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B. Menaker

customer_reviews.title: Replacement speaker works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement speaker for our bathroom. We use this speaker for our kids while they are taking a bath and during my morning showers so I can listen to my Alexa (NPR news). The volume level is great, can be adjusted on the speaker and I've had to issues with the battery life. It's a great product and better than my previous Bluetooth speaker which was a Sound Logic speaker.
customer_reviews.author: rufiogrrrl

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality even in the shower!
customer_reviews.text: I hung it on the shower curtain rod and listen to my books while taking a shower. The sound quality is great even while the water is running. Exactly what I was looking for. It’s easy to use, simple and easy to connect to my devices thru blue tooth. No wires to tie you to a spot. You can use it in the yard, in the car as well as anywhere in the house. I don’t think I would use it while jogging because it would bounce around, but it would probably work while bicycling. You can even connect it to your phone and use it for phone calls! I absolutely love ie!
customer_reviews.author: Grandmom Judy

customer_reviews.title: Mostly OK while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: We bought this speaker about 6 months ago and it worked pretty well. The sound quality was good enough and it was plenty loud enough. To connect a different device, we had to go disconnect whatever was connected to it or it wouldn't allow a different device, but that was a minor annoyance that we could live with. Sadly, the speaker stopped holding a charge a few days ago. We've tried different cords and outlets and it's just dead. It'll be a quiet shower today :(
customer_reviews.author: Eric K.

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker for the shower!
customer_reviews.text: Great little speaker! Sounds good and is easy to pair. I would definitely recommend it! Sadly, after a year of limited use (I use a shower radio most of the time and only use this two or three times a month), it doesn't hold a charge for very long and it just randomly powers off. I'll look for something a little more reliable next time. Update: iFox contacted me within a few hours of posting my review and offered to send me a new speaker even though it's been over a year since I bought it. I guess I shouldn't have assumed I was out of luck. With customer service like that, I am so glad I bought that speaker!
customer_reviews.author: D. Hoose

customer_reviews.title: Nice little unit.  Second time's the charm...
customer_reviews.text: My initial review was 3 stars on this product because the one I got, I could literally not hear in the shower. I was contacted by customer service, and we went through a few troubleshooting things on the device, but I could not get it any louder. So, they sent me a new one, and I must say it is louder, I just took a shower with it, and I could hear the person talking and enunciating well enough to say that it fulfills its function.
customer_reviews.author: Lyal S

customer_reviews.title: Great Shape and Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker for the shower or the pool. I received this purchase as a Christmas gift and I use it about 4-5 times a week and I haven't have to charge it yet. I suction cupped it to the shower wall and there I haven't had a problem with it sliding or falling off. Sound quality is great and there is no static or weird noises from it interring with the water. This speaker can also be turned upside down and float in the bath tub or a pool.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I got this so I could listen to music in the shower, and it works great. It pairs super easy, the sound quality is great for such a small speaker. I have been using it for 3 weeks and still have not needed to charge it. I don’t use the suction cup because none of them stick to my tile, but I just sit it on my shelf in my shower and it balances there great. I don’t have any issues with it not being loud enough. I have actually had to turn the volume down on my phone because it was a little too loud. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda Ross

customer_reviews.title: Very glad I bought this, it meets/exceeds my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Can get very loud (if this isn't loud enough then you are doing something wrong) -good sound -the suction cup seems to work well, it has stayed in place for about a week so far -good battery life Cons: - controls are not easy to use, it is too easy to change the track while trying to adjust the volume (more of a problem while listening to podcasts and losing your spot when returning to the previous one), would be better if the tow buttons could be separate -the charger is not micro USB so you have to keep track of it -more expensive than alternatives, but so far it seems worth the price to me
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Benevides

customer_reviews.title: Compact, Great Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: I previously owned 2 i Shower radios which were battery suckers. The last one I had just died and I'd only had it for about 3 years. Very disappointed for the price they charge. Decided to go the less expensive route that doesn't require batteries and so far so good. Connects easily, item is compact, has nice suction backing which I personally don't use because I put the speaker on a shelf but is a nice feature. Strictly using in the shower and the sound quality is great. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lostie in Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product! I never do reviews but I had to!
customer_reviews.text: Love the speaker! It’s too loud for my shower if I turn it up the whole way, but sometimes I turn it up the whole way so I can hear it in my bedroom after showering while I’m getting ready. Great speaker for a great price! I really like how my phone automatically connects, simply by turning on the speaker. Also, the large suction cup hasn’t allowed the speaker to fall off the shower wall yet and it’s been a couple weeks. Buy one! Also, probably the best customer service, they really care about their customers.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Kirsch

customer_reviews.title: Good features but not very good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Not that I need/expect great sound quality for playing music in the shower, and sound quality obviously isn't a priority for this type of speaker, but that is the main area where it could use improvement. I'm not an audiophile and usually don't really notice sound quality issues, but this is noticeable. The suction cup seems very strong so far. Haven't used it too much but so far haven't had to re-charge it. The buttons are functional and easy to use. Easy to pair/connect. Have not fully submerged it yet, but I've definitely gotten it wet plenty, and no issues there.
customer_reviews.author: smj123

customer_reviews.title: Long life
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who against my wishes LOL loves to sing in the shower. And he's always trying to prop his phone up on the sink so for Christmas I came across this and so far it works really well lol. Very easy to set up it took a second to hook to his phone through Bluetooth and it was very easy to charge. So far it sticks to the wall and the sound quality is pretty darn good.
customer_reviews.author: Melsa

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money. Maybe $10.
customer_reviews.text: Works decently. A little disappointed of the sound. But battery life is great! The only real issue is after 3 weeks of it in my bathroom the sound peaks a lot making it pretty unsatisfying. Even at half volume it will peak. Its a decent speaker. Not worth 30 bucks. EDIT: It has not been 2 months, the peaking has increased. I've found out it only peaks when I utilize the suction cup. So half of the purpose of me purchasing this is now useless. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND IF YOU WANT TO USE THE SUCTION CUP. The suction cup has recently also been failing to stay stuck to average surfaces such as my mirror or even my flat shower walls.
customer_reviews.author: gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the shower
customer_reviews.text: The suction cup on the back works extremely well. I was concerned whether it would stay on my shower wall, but the very first time it stuck right on and never came off (until I pulled it off). It seems well made. The sound quality isn't the best, but it's certainly not bad either, and for a waterproof speaker it's probably fantastic. For a relatively small speaker it puts out quite a bit of sound. If you're looking for something to let you play your tunes in the shower, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: NT77

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: The iFox iF012 is a great Bluetooth speaker. It pairs easily with my iPhone 6s Version ios11, has significant play time and nice volume. As I stream radio programs throughout the day, it is convenient to take speaker to wherever I go. Thank you iFox Creations!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff F.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality! Don't be fooled by the price!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is so amazing! I was so skeptical at first, because all of my music brand equipment include Beats Music, Bose, and Samsung. I don't have one music equipment in my house that doesn't have amazing sound equality. So, when I saw this item for only $30, I wasn't impressed. Since it would be for my shower, I figured "what the heck?". This speaker has an amazing sound quality! I do live in an apartment building, so I did fear that even on one of its lowest settings, it would disturb my neighbors. Overall, I am super impressed and would highly recommend to anyone looking for a good quality speaker.
customer_reviews.author: LeeLee

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about 2 weeks now and I really love it! It stays on my shower and doesn't slip. It did fall off one day, but now I just take it off when I'm done. The sound is pretty good. It's not the most amazing speaker ever, but for the price, it's not supposed to be. It's really easy to connect to my phone and easy to control in the shower. I would 100% recommend this product."
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: New review, after being asked to change it multiple times.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE on 11.23: I was contacted by the seller and offered a replacement. It does work perfectly. I'm happy to have a working speaker. This worked for a few months and then stopped holding a charge. Even when it was brand new, I couldnt hear it above the water in my shower, even when it was right in the shower with me. I turned the volume on both my iphone and the speaker all the way up.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Luke

customer_reviews.title: happy with this speaker
customer_reviews.text: Second update. I was contacted by customer service and they replaced the speaker. Very happy with the service. KUpdate-I can’t get volume controls to work. Some customer service regarding this would help. I’ve only had the speaker for a week now, so I can’t comment on the battery life. However it was easy to connect to my Wi-Fi. I use it to listen to audio books and the voices are crisp and clear. It gets wet in the shower spray with no effect at all. I’m very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Ipema
